name: LoungeflyPocahontas: Prinses Scene Portemonnee - Merchoid Nederland
description: Are you ready to take a journey through the wilderness with Pocahontas? Well, you're in luck because we have the perfect accessory to accompany you on your adventure - the Pocahontas Princess Scene Wallet! Just imagine, you're strolling through the forest, the colors of the wind swirling around you, and suddenly you need to take out your ID or credit card. No problem, this wallet has four slots for your cards and a clear one for your ID. It's like having your own personal compass - guiding you in the right direction. But wait, there's more! Not only is the scene on the front of the wallet absolutely stunning with Pocahontas standing in front of a sunset, the back of the wallet features Pocahontas and John Smith journeying through the woods together. Talk about couple goals! Not only is this wallet incredibly practical, it's also environmentally conscious as it is made of vegan leather (polyurethane). The zippers are made with sturdy metal hardware to ensure your belongings are safe no matter where your journey takes you. And let's not forget the coordinating inside lining - because even your wallet deserves to be stylish. Incorporate some Disney magic into your everyday life with this officially licensed Pocahontas Princess Scene Wallet. Whether it's for yourself or a gift for a fellow Disney fan, this wallet is the perfect way to celebrate the empowering and inspiring character of Pocahontas. Don't let your adventure go off course - make sure you have the Pocahontas Princess Scene Wallet by your side.Additional information:- Dimensions: 6"W x 4"H (Please note: width is measured across the bottom of the wallet.)- Officially licensed Disney productProduct DetailsProduct type: WalletLicense: PocahontasManufacturer: LoungeflySpecificaties Gewicht: Ongeveer 150 gram (5 ounces) Land van herkomst: China Materialen: Kunstleer (polyurethaan) SKU: WDWA2262GTIN: 671803431867
